message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.NE, cs.MM 

This paper proposes a method for improving semantic segmentation using adversarial learning and semi-supervised learning. The topic of semantic segmentation is closely related to computer vision (cs.CV), and the use of adversarial networks is a popular technique in deep learning (cs.LG). The paper also discusses the use of additional supervisory signals, which is a common theme in artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and neural networks (cs.NE). Finally, the paper presents experimental results on two datasets, which is a common approach in multimedia (cs.MM) research.
